text: Members of the Political Bureau of the National Freedom Front including its leader MP Wimal Weerawansa met with President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidents Official Residence on 11th October.The meeting took place to express their ideas and suggestions regarding the drafting of the new constitution.General Secretary Priyanjith Vitharana, Members of the Political Bureau Weerakumara Dissanayake, Jayantha Samaraweera, Niroshan Premarathne and Mohammed Muzammil also participated
title: NFF members meet President
